game.name: Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Includes level editor, Commentary available, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Entirely rebuilt from the ground up, Q.U.B.E. 10th Anniversary is the ultimate celebration of the decade-old original, bringing refined visuals, completely redesigned and revised gameplay sections, and a whole new chapter to the award-winning, brain-twisting first-person puzzler.
